description: GDP (PPP) represents total gross domestic production in a given grid cell in constant 2011 international US dollars.
title: GDP per Capita
citation: M. Kummu, M. Taka, J. H. A. Guillaume, and S. Characteristic, “Data Descriptor: Gridded global datasets for Gross Domestic Product and Human Development Index over 1990-2015 Background & Summary,” 2018, doi: 10.1038/sdata.2018.4.
